ygData.subject: Re: How Effective is the Glipmse spell?
ygData.msgSnippet: And up until you reach lvl 8, you get Sense summon, which is worthless except that there is no lag between when you can cast it again.  As soon as you are
ygData.messageBody:
And up until you reach lvl 8, you get Sense summon, which is worthless
except that there is no lag between when you can cast it again. As soon as
you are ready to cast again you can, with glimpse there is a delay as to
when you can cast it again.

Shadair

From: Jonathan Bally <jonathan@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 01, 1999 1:42 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: How Effective is the Glipmse spell?


> From: Jonathan Bally <jonathan@...>
>
> basically glimpse ROCKS why ? because it cost 5 mana to cast and you
> do need to max divination because when you reach level 16 you have
> invisibility
